attributes.action: Surrender to a War Crimes Court to answer for his ILLEGAL IRAQ war
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Blair lied to Parliament, took the UK into an unwarranted & illegal war on the instruction of the USA. As a result he is personally responsible for the deaths of every member of the British military who has died needlessly in Iraq

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
